tuv.seg: Case study: Help with school costs for a family
Cás-Staidéar: Cabhrú le costais scoile do theaghlach
Mary is a single parent with 3 children aged 14, 10 and 7
Is tuismitheoir singil í Máire le triúr leanaí in aois 14, 10 agus 7
Each year she finds that the cost of uniforms and school books for her children is a major expense
Gach bliain bíonn mórchostas ag baint leis na héidí agus leabhair scoile dá leanaí
She wants to know if she is entitled to the Back to School Clothing and Footwear Allowance and if there are any other grants to help with the cost of going to school
Teastaíonn uaithi a fháil amach an bhfuil sí i dteideal an Liúntais Éadaí agus Coisbhirt don Scoilbhliain Nua agus an bhfuil aon deontais eile ann chun cabhrú le costas na scolaíochta
She gets no maintenance from her ex-partner for herself or the children
Ní fhaigheann sí aon chothabháil óna hiarpháirtí di féin nó do na leanaí
She gets the One-Parent Family Payment and gets €90 a week from a part-time job
Faigheann sí Íocaíocht um Theaghlach Aontuismitheora agus faigheann sí €90 sa tseachtain ó obair pháirt-aimseartha
She also has a medical card
Tá cárta leighis aici chomh maith
As she is on a social welfare payment she is entitled to the Back to School Clothing and Footwear Allowance provided that her income is below a certain level
Toisc go bhfuil sé ar íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh, tá sí i dteideal an Liúntais Éadaí agus Coisbhirt don Scoilbhliain Nua chomh fada agus go bhfuil a hioncam faoi bhun leibhéal áirithe
Mary’s weekly income is made up of her One-Parent Family Payment of €282.40 and her earnings of €90, which comes to a total of €372.40
Cuimsíonn ioncam seachtainiúil Mháire a hÍocaíocht um Theaghlach Aontuismitheora de €282.40 agus a cuid tuillimh de €90, sin €372.40 san iomlán
The Back to School Clothing and Footwear Allowance weekly income limit for a single parent with 3 children is €477.70 in 2017
Is é an teorainn sheachtainiúil ioncaim do thuismitheoir singil le triúr leanaí maidir leis an Liúntas Éadaí agus Coisbhirt don Scoilbhliain Nua ná €477.70 ( 2017)
So Mary qualifies for a payment for each of the children
Cáilíonn Máire d'íocaíocht mar sin do gach duine dá leanaí
From June 2017 she will get €200 for her eldest child and €100 for each of the younger children which comes to a total of €400
Ó Meitheamh 2017 gheobhaidh sí €200 dá leanbh is sine agus €100 do gach duine de na leanaí níos óige, sin €400 san iomlán
She may also be entitled to a payment to help with the cost of school books
D'fhéadfadh sí a bheith i dteideal íocaíochta chomh maith chun cabhrú le costas na leabhar scoile
She should ask the principals of the children’s schools about this
Ba chóir di ceist a chur ar na príomhoidí i scoileanna na leanaí faoin méid seo
Next year her eldest child will be doing the Junior Cert exam
Beidh a hiníon ag déanamh an Teastais Shóisearaigh an bhliain seo chugainn
As Mary has a medical card she will not have to pay the exam fee
Ní bheidh dualgas ar Mháire táille an scrúdaithe a íoc toisc go bhfuil cárta leighis aici
